title: Kerry
creator_credit: Jan Sharp, Tom Manefield and Film Australia
brief_description:
Episode of Series “Growing Up”.
Kerry is a fifteen year old girl who leaves home and lives with her boyfriend. She becomes pregnant and returns to her family. The film considers some of the effects that the pregnancy and the decision to keep the baby have on Kerry’s relationship with her family and her boyfriend.
creator_credit_for_label: Jan Sharp, Tom Manefield and Film Australia
